title: Human Activity Taxonomy for AGI Progress Mapping
description: A comprehensive taxonomy classifying all human activities for predicting AI automation timelines

coreThesis: Software AGI operates in abstract/symbolic space and solves abstract tasks first
Embodied AGI requires physical interaction and solves physical tasks later
Primary predictors: (1) Abstraction level, (2) Error tolerance

designPrinciples.name: Predict, don't describe
designPrinciples.description: Optimize for attributes that predict AI capability timing, not occupational classification

designPrinciples.name: Task, not job
designPrinciples.description: A nurse performs dozens of tasks; each belongs in the taxonomy separately

designPrinciples.name: Observable, not inferred
designPrinciples.description: Activities are objectively identifiable, not based on mental states

designPrinciples.name: Technology-agnostic
designPrinciples.description: Define by human capability required, not current technology

designPrinciples.name: MECE compliant
designPrinciples.description: Mutually exclusive, collectively exhaustiveâ€”every activity fits exactly one category

methodology.organizingPrinciple: Abstraction-Embodiment Spectrum: Domains ordered from highest abstraction (earliest AI automation) to lowest abstraction (latest AI automation)

domains.name: Symbolic Computation
domains.description: Pure transformation of formal symbols, numbers, or structured data without reference to real-world meaning
inclusionCriteria: Input/output are formal symbols (numbers, code, logical expressions)
Transformation rules are explicit and deterministic
No interpretation of real-world meaning required

activities.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
activities.description: Performing addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division on numbers

activities.name: Statistical Calculations
activities.description: Computing statistical measures such as mean, median, standard deviation, and correlations

activities.name: Spreadsheet Formula Evaluation
activities.description: Executing cell formulas and functions in spreadsheet applications

activities.name: Financial Calculations
activities.description: Computing interest rates, amortization schedules, and financial ratios

activities.name: Matrix and Linear Algebra Operations
activities.description: Performing matrix multiplication, inversion, eigenvalue decomposition, and vector operations

activities.name: Data Format Conversion
activities.description: Converting data between formats such as JSON, XML, CSV, and proprietary formats

activities.name: Database Query Execution
activities.description: Running SQL or NoSQL queries to retrieve, filter, and aggregate data

activities.name: ETL Pipeline Execution
activities.description: Running extract, transform, and load processes to move data between systems

activities.name: Data Deduplication and Cleansing
activities.description: Identifying and removing duplicate records and correcting data inconsistencies

activities.name: Schema Mapping and Migration
activities.description: Transforming data structures from one schema to another
exampleTasks: Mapping legacy schemas to new formats

activities.name: Code Compilation
activities.description: Translating source code into executable machine code or bytecode

activities.name: Syntax Validation
activities.description: Checking code or data for syntactic correctness against grammar rules

activities.name: Schema Validation
activities.description: Verifying data conforms to a defined schema or specification

activities.name: Type Checking
activities.description: Verifying type correctness in statically or dynamically typed programs

activities.name: Formal Proof Verification
activities.description: Checking mathematical or logical proofs for correctness using proof assistants

activities.name: Checksum and Hash Verification
activities.description: Computing and comparing cryptographic hashes to verify data integrity

activities.name: Sorting and Ordering
activities.description: Arranging data elements according to specified criteria

activities.name: Search and Retrieval
activities.description: Finding specific items within data structures using search algorithms

activities.name: Graph Traversal and Pathfinding
activities.description: Navigating graph structures to find paths or visit nodes

activities.name: Encryption and Decryption
activities.description: Applying cryptographic algorithms to encode or decode data

activities.name: Compression and Decompression
activities.description: Reducing data size using compression algorithms and restoring original data

activities.name: Scheduling and Optimization
activities.description: Executing algorithms to find optimal arrangements or schedules

domains.name: Information Synthesis
domains.description: Combining, analyzing, and transforming information from multiple sources to produce new informational outputs
inclusionCriteria: Primary input/output are information (text, data, documents)
Can be performed entirely through digital interfaces
exclusionCriteria: Primary output is a physical artifact

categories.name: Research & Analysis
categories.description: Literature review, market research, data analysis

activities.name: Literature Review
activities.description: Systematically searching, reading, and synthesizing published research on a topic

activities.name: Market Research
activities.description: Gathering and analyzing information about markets, competitors, and consumer behavior

activities.name: Statistical Data Analysis
activities.description: Applying statistical methods to datasets to extract insights and test hypotheses

activities.name: Due Diligence Research
activities.description: Comprehensive investigation of companies, individuals, or assets for business decisions

activities.name: Survey Analysis
activities.description: Processing and interpreting responses from surveys and questionnaires

activities.name: Technical Documentation
activities.description: Creating written documentation explaining technical systems, processes, or products

activities.name: Business Report Writing
activities.description: Composing formal reports on business performance, projects, or initiatives

activities.name: Executive Summary Creation
activities.description: Distilling lengthy documents or data into concise summaries for decision-makers

activities.name: Meeting Minutes Documentation
activities.description: Recording and formatting key points, decisions, and action items from meetings

activities.name: Research Paper Writing
activities.description: Drafting academic or scientific papers presenting research methodology and findings

activities.name: Content Tagging and Labeling
activities.description: Assigning descriptive tags, keywords, or labels to content for retrieval

activities.name: Document Classification
activities.description: Sorting documents into predefined categories based on content

activities.name: Knowledge Base Maintenance
activities.description: Organizing, updating, and maintaining repositories of organizational knowledge

activities.name: Metadata Management
activities.description: Creating and maintaining descriptive information about data assets

activities.name: Content Deduplication
activities.description: Identifying and resolving duplicate or near-duplicate content across systems

activities.name: Trend Analysis
activities.description: Identifying and interpreting patterns of change over time in data

activities.name: Anomaly Detection
activities.description: Identifying unusual patterns, outliers, or deviations in data

activities.name: Correlation Analysis
activities.description: Discovering and measuring relationships between variables in datasets

activities.name: Sentiment Analysis
activities.description: Determining emotional tone and opinion from text data

activities.name: Clustering and Segmentation
activities.description: Grouping data points or entities based on shared characteristics

activities.name: Predictive Pattern Modeling
activities.description: Building models to predict future outcomes based on historical patterns

activities.name: Product Recommendations
activities.description: Suggesting products or services based on user preferences and behavior

activities.name: Content Recommendations
activities.description: Suggesting articles, videos, or media based on user interests

activities.name: Decision Support Analysis
activities.description: Providing ranked options and analysis to support human decision-making

activities.name: Resource Allocation Suggestions
activities.description: Recommending optimal distribution of resources based on constraints and goals

activities.name: Talent Matching
activities.description: Matching candidates to job requirements or team compositions

activities.name: Diagnostic Recommendations
activities.description: Suggesting likely diagnoses or solutions based on symptoms or indicators

domains.name: Creative Generation
domains.description: Producing novel artifacts (text, images, code, music, designs) that did not exist before
inclusionCriteria: Success measured by creativity, aesthetics, or functional innovation
Output exists in digital or symbolic form

activities.name: Fiction Writing
activities.description: Creating original narrative prose including novels, short stories, and creative nonfiction

activities.name: Copywriting
activities.description: Writing persuasive marketing and advertising content for products, services, and brands

activities.name: Screenwriting
activities.description: Writing scripts for film, television, video content, and stage productions

activities.name: Journalism
activities.description: Researching and writing news articles, features, and investigative pieces

activities.name: Technical Writing
activities.description: Creating documentation, manuals, specifications, and instructional content

activities.name: Graphic Design
activities.description: Creating visual compositions for print and digital media including layouts, posters, and marketing materials

activities.name: UI/UX Design
activities.description: Designing user interfaces and experiences for digital products including websites and applications

activities.name: Digital Illustration
activities.description: Creating original artwork and illustrations using digital tools

activities.name: Brand Identity Design
activities.description: Developing comprehensive visual identity systems including logos, color palettes, and style guides

activities.name: Motion Graphics
activities.description: Creating animated visual content for video, web, and interactive media

activities.name: Application Development
activities.description: Writing code for software applications including web, mobile, and desktop programs

activities.name: System Architecture Design
activities.description: Designing high-level structure of software systems including components, interfaces, and data flows

activities.name: Algorithm Development
activities.description: Designing and implementing computational algorithms and data structures

activities.name: Database Design
activities.description: Designing database schemas, data models, and query optimization

activities.name: DevOps & Infrastructure
activities.description: Designing and implementing deployment pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and automation

activities.name: Code Review & Refactoring
activities.description: Reviewing code quality, identifying improvements, and restructuring existing code

categories.name: Musical Composition
categories.description: Creating music, sound design, audio production

activities.name: Song Composition
activities.description: Creating original musical compositions including melodies, harmonies, and arrangements

activities.name: Sound Design
activities.description: Creating and manipulating audio elements for media including synthesized sounds and effects

activities.name: Audio Production & Mixing
activities.description: Recording, editing, mixing, and mastering audio tracks for release

activities.name: Film & Game Scoring
activities.description: Composing original music for visual media including films, games, and advertisements

activities.name: Podcast & Audio Content Production
activities.description: Producing spoken-word audio content including editing, post-production, and publishing

activities.name: Business Strategy Development
activities.description: Formulating organizational strategies including market positioning, competitive analysis, and growth planning

activities.name: Product Design
activities.description: Conceptualizing and designing new products including features, specifications, and user needs

activities.name: Innovation & Invention
activities.description: Generating novel ideas, concepts, and solutions for technical or business problems

activities.name: Service Design
activities.description: Designing end-to-end service experiences including touchpoints, processes, and customer journeys

activities.name: Business Model Innovation
activities.description: Developing and iterating on business models including revenue streams, value propositions, and partnerships

domains.name: Interpersonal Communication
domains.description: Exchanging information, ideas, and intentions between humans through primarily digital or verbal channels
inclusionCriteria: Primary purpose is information exchange between people
Can be conducted via digital channels
Involves interpretation of intent and context

domains.name: Procedural Service Delivery
domains.description: Providing services to others by following established procedures and protocols
inclusionCriteria: Interaction is transactional rather than relational

domains.name: Care & Relational Support
domains.description: Activities primarily focused on human wellbeing, emotional support, and relationship maintenance
inclusionCriteria: Primary purpose is human wellbeing or relationship
Success depends on trust, empathy, or emotional attunement
exclusionCriteria: Can be fully automated without loss of value

categories.name: Healthcare Delivery
categories.description: Nursing, therapy, medical care (direct patient contact)

domains.name: Structured Physical Operations
domains.description: Physical manipulation and movement within controlled, predictable environments
inclusionCriteria: Primary activity involves physical manipulation or operation
Physical objects are uniform or classified

domains.name: Skilled Physical Craft
domains.description: Physical manipulation requiring expertise, dexterity, and judgment
inclusionCriteria: Requires acquired physical skill and expertise

domains.name: Environmental Navigation
domains.description: Moving through and interacting with unstructured, dynamic environments
inclusionCriteria: Primary activity is locomotion or navigation
Physical safety is a primary constraint

categories.name: Exploration & Search
categories.description: Search and rescue, inspection of novel environments

domains.name: Personal Embodiment
domains.description: Activities for maintaining one's own body, meeting basic human needs, and personal self-expression through physical activity
inclusionCriteria: Cannot be delegated without losing essential meaning
exclusionCriteria: Work performed for compensation (see other domains)
Can be meaningfully automated for the person

multiDomainActivities.principle: When an activity involves multiple domains, classify by primary purpose

boundaryRules.rule: If requires interpretation of meaning -> Domain 2
If output must be novel/creative -> Domain 3
If relationship > transaction -> Domain 4; if procedure > relationship -> Domain 5
If primary activity is locomotion -> Domain 9
If for self vs. for work -> Domain 10 (self) or 9 (work)

contextModifiers.description: The same physical action may classify differently based on context
